div.div: Here, using staticjinja, all files in the 'pages' directory in the 'src' directory are inserted into a template file. This is done to cutdown on the amount of re-used HTML.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 307px; margin-left: 480px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Once the site is templated, post processing is applied which includes the followig:
- Converting local links to absolute. ('iGEM server does not support relative.')

div.style: font-size: 11px
div.font: - Sets non-iGEM links to open in a new browser.

div.style: font-size: 11px
div.font: - Minimize html and css files to speed up load time.

div.style: font-size: 11px
div.font: - Replaces with '<references id="1" /> with citations based on a process file.'

div.style: font-size: 11px
div.font: - Replaces with '<bibliography /> with bibliographies based on reference tags on a page.'

switch.text: Once the site is templated, post processing...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 307px; margin-left: 735px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Finally, with the entire site built, the site is synced with the iGEM MediaWiki server.

switch.text: Finally, with the entire site bu...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 337px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Once code is committed to GitHub, the CI/CD pipeline is kicked off using GitHub Actions.

switch.text: Once code is committed to GitHub...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 678px; height: 1px; padding-top: 110px; margin-left: 239px;

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
